Going to miss BloggerCon IV

The end of June is shaping up to be a busy month. Have been having to check my schedule to make sure things don't overlap.

Have the June Sacramento .NET User Group meeting on the 27th, followed a day later by a lovely dentist appointment. The week before, have a Styx) concert (the greatest band).

And, unfortunately, the one conflict I have is with BloggerCon June 23-24, since I will be in Dallas. I had been looking forward to BloggerCon and representing Telligent/Community Server, but it got organized kind of late, and then I realized I wasn't going to be able to make it.

Perhaps next time... it would be nice to get Community Server a little bit more exposure outside of the Microsoft/.NET world.

Tuesday, June 13, 2006

About

This is the personal blog of Ken Robertson. I'm a developer at Involver working in Ruby/Rails. In a former life, I worked in .NET for many years and since moved on.

In my spare time, I like to build things. I like to experiment with different technologies to find how they best fit onto my utility belt.

I sometimes blog. You'll find those things here.

I sometimes code. You'll find those on Github.
